title: Game Not Starting
body: So right after "Prepare yourself the battle is about to begin" it stopped, and we all chated for like 3 min then we had an idea to log out and back in again. Me and my fried did that but when we tried to reconnect we would be pressing the button reconnect but it wasn't working.

replies.body: EUNE encountered game service issues around the time you posted this. The issues were resolved shortly after they started, so if you're still having issues, let me know.
Im having the same issue at this very moment!! Rito!
